Address.label: Address
Address.value: 8501 NORTH SCOTTSDALE ROAD,GAINEY CENTER II, SUITE 100, SCOTTSDALE, Arizona, 85253, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: TPI Composites Inc is engaged in manufacturing composite wind blades. The company operates in wind energy and transportation industries where it manufactures structures for a bus, rail, theme parks, and trucks. Geographically the segments are divided into the U.S, Asia, Mexico, EMEA and India where the Mexico segment derives a majority of revenue.
